channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pro-life father whose home FBI raided appeals ruling by 'activist' judge: ‘Faulty investigation’

item.title: Supreme Court blocks new deportations of Venezuelans in Texas under 18th century Alien Enemies Act
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court blocked, at least for now, the deportations of any Venezuelans held in northern Texas under an 18th century wartime law.

item.title: Trump is loosening red tape to help America’s $20 billion seafood trade deficit. Conservation groups worry overfishing could unravel the ocean’s ‘safety net’
item.description: Trump's executive order drew praise from commercial fishing groups and condemnation from environmental organizations.
